name: Monster Truck Drive
description: Maneuver a capable modern monster truck in 4 unique levels: arena, moon, hills and dusk. No time limits. 3 different camera views. Perfect for casual gamers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0
